pr_title: Call deconstruct in reverse dependency order

timeline.message: Call deconstruct in reverse dependency order

timeline.author: bratseth

replies.bodyText: Yes, it should. Not sure it changes anything, and no idea why it's allowed, though :) Perhaps this isn't needed at all for the unit test.
replies.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText: Also, the test should probably run lots of times, to catch the 1/6 false positives each time. With randomised operation order before verification.
replies.author: jonmv

timeline.message: Remove unneeded inject statements and rerun test a few times
